name: Online Adult Content Manager
description:
The best way to organise your online adult content is now on Steam!

Online Adult Content Manager (OACM) manages and organises your online adult content. Save links to your favourite videos, images or any other link in one convenient location.

450 Links

Current support for 450 links allows you to save links to all of your favourite online adult content!

(OACM Demo supports up to 20 links)

3 Renamable Sections

Customise the way you use OACM by naming each section to whatever you like. Each section contains 150 links (15 pages) per section allows you to keep your collection organised.

(Not available in OACM Demo )

Pages System

With 15 pages per section, easily scroll through these pages with the buttons or click the indicator dots to jump directly to a page!

(Not available in OACM Demo )

Titles & Tags

Give each link a title and up to 3 tags to organise your collection

Copy to clipboard or Open in tab

Copy the link of your favourite adult content straight to the clipboard to paste in your browser or open the link straight into a new tab. The choice is yours!

Favourites System

Favourite any link in your collection to easily identify your absolute favourites! Favourites are split into sections and can be accessed from any section!

(Not available in OACM Demo )

Optional Password

You now have the option to add a password to OACM on start up. Allowing you to protect all your links

(Not available in OACM Demo )

Search System

Easily find your links!

Search through all links in a section to find what you are looking for!

(Not available in OACM Demo )

Improved Discreteness

Loading screens have been updated to not include the name of the app or what it is. With the use of the optional password, OACM protects your adult links!

Improved Accessibilities

As of v0.4 the Accessibilities backend has been completely reworked to provide a smoother and more stable experience with increased in-app performance!


Available NOW for Windows, MacOS & Linux!
